page.title: 03Clubs and Societies
page.content: There are various active organisations in the village; Parents' Association, Playgroup, Women's Institute, Mothers' Union, Women's Social Group, Over 60s Club, Youth Club, Cricket and Football Clubs, darts and skittles teams, Sunday Schools at both Church and Chapel, Wesley Guild and the Middlezoy Horticultural Society which has for the last 50 years organised an Annual Horticultural Show and Gymkhana within the village. The Middlezoy Show is held on the 2nd Saturday in August and attracts a large number of entries. There are classes for all sort of flowers, fruit and vegetables as well as home-made wine and preserves and corn. There are also special classes for art and craft work by children at the village school. Each year the school puts up a very attractive and varied display of children's work.
